Introduction

Shim Eun Jin is a South Korean singer and actress under BB Entertainment. She was, since 1998 to 2004, a member of the girl group Baby V.O.X.

In 2005 she changed her stage name to Zeeny's for the release of her solo debut album, although she changed it back to her real name name for her next releases. She was also an artist in her spare time and had an art exhibition featuring her works in 2013.
